tables.name: Policy
tables.description: Contains details of insurance policies issued to customers.

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the insurance policy.

fields.name: Cust Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the customer associated with the policy.

fields.name: Product Code
fields.description: Code representing the insurance product associated with the policy.

fields.name: Policy Type
fields.description: Type or category of the insurance policy.

fields.name: Pol Status
fields.description: Current status of the insurance policy (e.g., In Force, Expired, etc.).

fields.name: Agent Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the insurance agent responsible for the policy.

tables.name: Policy Term
tables.description: Contains details of policy terms including policy attributes, dates, and customer-agent association.

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy.

fields.name: Term Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy term.

fields.name: Cust Id
fields.description: Customer identifier associated with the policy term.

fields.name: Term Number
fields.description: Sequential number representing the policy term.

fields.name: Product Code
fields.description: Code representing the product associated with the policy.

fields.name: Effective date
fields.description: Start date when this policy term becomes effective.

fields.name: Expiry date
fields.description: Date when this policy term expires.

fields.name: Issue Date
fields.description: Date when the policy was issued.

fields.name: Policy Type
fields.description: Type of the policy, such as 'Policy' or other classifications.

fields.name: Pol Status
fields.description: Current status of the policy, such as 'Active' or 'Expired'.

fields.name: Renewal Date
fields.description: Date when the policy term is due for renewal.

fields.name: Agent Id
fields.description: Identifier for the insurance agent associated with the policy.

tables.name: Claim Header
tables.description: This table contains the summary information of insurance claims.

fields.name: Claim Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the claim.

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy associated with the claim.

fields.name: Term Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy term under which the loss occurred.

fields.name: Loss Date
fields.description: The date on which the insured loss occurred.

fields.name: Registered Date
fields.description: The date on which the claim was registered with the insurer.

fields.name: Loss type
fields.description: The type of loss reported, such as theft, fire, or accidental damage.

fields.name: Claim Status
fields.description: The current status of the claim, such as Open, Closed, or Pending.

fields.name: Loss location
fields.description: The geographical location where the loss occurred.

fields.name: Claimant ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the claimant making the claim.
